title: Problem patching League

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
I can't log in at all, the client just keeps on restarting!!! HELP!!

Edit: Whenever I do get to log in, a few minutes later it tells me to restart again.

replies.body: The infinite loop should be resolved at this time!
having the same issue, please send help >.<
apparently spamming the restart client helped me, took about 20 tries, second time in 2 days this has happened
but spamming the restart client and being able to log into my account, it just makes me restart a few minutes later... idk how to fix this
riot put a aware of situation message about it, prob just a client bug with the new patch, hopefully they fix it soon
